website_summaries.verdict: These waterproof gloves give users double the value with this unique 2-in-1 mitt design.
pros: Exterior pocket made for disposable hand heater
Extremely lightweight despite supreme weather protection
cons: A few customers had issues with the product's durability

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves what you expect when buying Burton
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves I had a similar pair that lasted for about 15 years. With all Burton products its very well made my only issue is with the 2nd pair of gloves it says you can keep them on and use a touch screen which I have had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Hands
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, I don't feel the touch screen sensitivity is quite there. But in all reality they are for keeping your hands warm not texting. They worked great for skiing all day long. My hands didn't feel cold at any point and they didn't feel fatigued from wearing them all day.
customer_reviews.author: ColdFrank45

customer_reviews.title: Great but seam ripping
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large pair at first (I wear a women’s large) but they were too big. I thought it would be ok and wore them for a weekend. They were too big, but I liked the gloves. Gave them to my husband (who is a boarder turned skier and now likes gloves) and bought the medium. Love the gloves Would be 5 star but after 6 uses one of the seams is ripping. Not happening on the larger pair yet so probably just a lemon but sad since I loved the gloves
customer_reviews.author: Rondi

customer_reviews.title: appears to be good quality and liner finger gloves are a good fit
customer_reviews.text: appears to be good quality and liner finger gloves are a good fit. I have not yet tested the mitts yet. Mainly bought for those once or twice a year snow shoveling days in North Carolina as my fingers seem to feel the cold the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Zambo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for boarding!
customer_reviews.text: These mittens are fantastic! Have used the multiple times on the mountain this season and not once were my hands the least bit cold, even with a -15 windchill. Having both the inner gloves and mittens together is fantastic. It is easy enough to slip the mittens on and off for the days where it gets a bit too warm. These will be my go to for snowboarding from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stayed dry
customer_reviews.text: Hands stayed dry even in wet spring conditions. (Wore them without the liners to avoid overheating.)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts, less than retail
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves for a better price than retail store. I've had a pair of theses mitts that I lost a year ago. If you've never wore mitts riding it will change your life.
customer_reviews.author: phothala bounmaphouxay

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought they would not be warm enough for our -40C temperatures without the inner liners. Turns out they are a lot warmer than they look and I seldom need the inner gloves. BTW the inner “touch screen” gloves don’t work too well on my iPhone 7 but this does not matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: K. R Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: All of my Gloves have been Burton. Just threw out a pair I bought in 1990. The quality of these gloves will never match my first pair but I'm happy with them nonetheless. Kept my hands warm in 20 degree weather but lesser temps will be tough. My age may play a part in that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen does work. Make your hands warm. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BenKaTop Contributor: Clarinets

customer_reviews.title: A northern Michigan must!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the warmest, strongest pair of gloves I’ve ever owned. The second pair of skinny gloves that go under the burton gloves are key and perfect for those extra cold windchill days. A northern Michigan must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly warm
customer_reviews.text: Took them to steamboat springs - it was in the low teens/single digits the entire time, and I never even used the undergloves. These mittens are NICE.
customer_reviews.author: michael diggs

customer_reviews.title: Love the mitt
customer_reviews.text: Love the mitt, but wish the cuff was a bit bigger. Also don't like the wrist tightening mechanism. I feel like it's going to tear out of the mitt. I probably wouldn't have bought these if I were able to try them on
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the older model.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought the same mittens that I was happy with the past 6 years, but it has been down graded. They kept my hands warm, BUT: The inner glove does not have any grip pads and cannot be use with a phone. The outer shell is wearing off after one season. Won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fai

customer_reviews.title: LOST WATER RESISTANCE AFTER 2 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: They look great but after 2 days of snowboarding the lost their water resistance and get soaked after a days worth of crashes. Fit is as expected, just use the size chart on the burton website. I love the look of these and since I just got these I'm not sure about durability. They aren't the easiest gloves to put back on while on the lift, so be warned. Would I buy again, NOPE. I need to buy water proofing spray or they're useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: otherwise they are well made and are nice warm
customer_reviews.text: only the outside of the mitten works on touch screens. The inside liner doesn't work on a touch screen. otherwise they are well made and are nice warm gloves
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good winter investment
customer_reviews.text: Great investment; very good quality stitch work; durable; warm; the outside mitten is touch screen compatible but inside gloves are not (that's odd) but otherwise love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mersad Kajtazovic

customer_reviews.title: No insert gloves
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item to use for my snowboarding trip, supposed to be 2n1 but all I got were the mitts, while the mittens are warm, it's not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of mitts! comfy, super warm, no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs? Maybe try a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Super warm gloves. Maybe I have really long thumbs but my thumbs get really cold due to them being pressed into the very end of the thumb portion of the glove. But overall I am very happy with the mitts.
customer_reviews.author: NbdavN

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for snow boarding and I’ve been very happy. Fingers stay dry and warm. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the BUrtan name
customer_reviews.text: nothing special especially for the money, if I wasnt planning a trip this week I would send them back and order someting else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves with liner
customer_reviews.text: Great mittens. They fit well (XL) with or without the liners. There's a little rubber nub on the tip that allows you to use your touchscreen device - it works well. Kept my hands warm skiing in ~10 degree F weather.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at 30 deg F with liner included. Nice straps and hooks
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They are great, and I would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my son. They are great, and I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Kept my hands extra warm when wearing both the liner ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my hands extra warm when wearing both the liner gloves and mittens. Snowboarded in 10 degree weather and my hands stayed warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves. A little big but probably my fault
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XL and i probably should have ordered large. I purchased another pair of burton gloves (L) and they fit perfectly. Kept my hands dry and toasty
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I use these for snowboarding in Wisconsin. Both the mitts and liners are very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son's birthday. He said they fit just right and is exactly what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Pam G

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...expect more from Burton.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves...kept my hands warm and dry, however have ripped in the palms already.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Deliver warmth and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, warm combo. My only knock is that the liner gloves could be touch compatible. Overall they're excellent mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great if that is what you need
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are very warm. Great if that is what you need. On the other hand they get sweaty inside and there is no way to dry them out. The instructions say you should never turn the gloves inside out. since the shell is waterproof and the opening where water could escape is quite small, it takes several days to dry the gloves completely. Wonder how long before they get moldy and stuff growing inside...
customer_reviews.author: O. Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these in Colorado in January. ~15 degrees F. Kept my hands dry and warm. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mittens I've ever owned, and I've owned a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm, but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are VERY warm, and really comfortable. However, I wore them for a 3-day weekend boarding trip and by the end the leather was peeling off the palm and the stitching inside one of the mitts was coming un-stitched. So, they need a quality check for $50. I wish they were more durable, but one long weekend and they were done for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome pair of gloves. Especially when you have the inner glove. The touch screen thing doesn't work unless you have the mitten on but whatever I don't need to be texting while snowboarding. Would be nice to change the song but it will all buff out on the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Kapsig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item!! My son boards all the time and these work great for him
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY A CRAMSEY

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves I have ever owned! Get them!
customer_reviews.text: I these gloves are amazing! I was skeptical about buying because I saw some bad reviews but these are great! Don't trust those bad reviews these are the best gloves I own! Even without the inner gloves they are very warm. They kind of wet on the outside but dried out in 10 minutes. They feel great and the screen touch actually works. If you are looking for high quality gloves these are the ones!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They keep my hands warm and even have ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They keep my hands warm and even have pockets for hand warmers, which I have needed only in extreme cold conditions.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice if Amazon had more details about this product
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if Amazon had more details about this product. It was not the cold weather mitten that I wanted but there was limited information.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sullivan

product_meta.title: Burton Men's Baker 2-in-1 Mitten
product_meta.description:
Wear just the liner, just the insulated shell, or combine the two for fully loaded versatility with two options in one.

On the surface, the Burton Baker 2-In-1 Mitt might seem like just another awesome mitt. Look deeper, and you’ll see that it’s actually a TOTALLY awesome mitt that happens to love riding in the absolute crappiest conditions. A potent shot of Thermacore insulation combined with a fleece lining serves up mouthwatering heat. DRYRIDE 2L fabric and the extra waterproof DRYRIDE Membrane offer a refreshingly dry finish. Too warm or still cold? Control your climate with the hidden, dual function heater/vent pocket which is built to accommodate a disposable handwarmer. Text and manage your music with the Screen Grab palm and its stealth, full coverage touchscreen control.

 * DRYRIDE 2-Layer Fabric
 * Waterproof DRYRIDE Membrane
 * Thermacore Insulation
 * Brushed Microfiber Fixed Lining
 * Removable 4-Way Stretch DRYRIDE Thermex Liner
 * Heater / Vent Pocket
 * Ergonomic Pre-Curved Fit
 * Removable Wrist Leash
feature_bullets: Screen Grab Toughgrip Palm For Total Touchscreen Control
DRYRIDE two-layer fabric with waterproof DRYRIDE Membrane 2.0; Ergonomic pre-curved fit
Screen Grab Toughgrip palm for total touchscreen control
Thermacore insulation with brushed microfiber fixed lining provides added warmth
Removable four-way stretch DRYRIDE Thermex liner provides amplified warmth and versatility
Heater/vent pocket can hold a disposable handwarmer or provide ventilation; Removable wrist leash
